name: @ca0v/typescriptlab
description: Nested package dependencies, l1, l2, l3, build into a single AMD module (l3/dist/index.js)

scripts.terser: terser node_modules/requirejs/require.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js src/yall.js dist/index.js -o dist/app.js --source-map "url='./app.js.map',content='./dist/index.js.map',includeSources=true"
scripts.run: npm run compile && npm run terser && npm run server
